# timestamp

**Instance Property**

The time at which the image was captured.

## Declaration

```swift
var timestamp: CMTime { get }
```

## Discussion

This timestamp is always synchronized to the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureSession/masterClock] time of the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureSession] object to which the photo output is connected.

## Resolving photo capture requests

- **resolvedSettings**: The settings object that was used to request this photo capture.
- **photoCount**: The 1-based index of this photo capture relative to other results from the same capture request.
